burnUnits(string[],uint256[]).details: Can only be called by world or world asset

params.unitAmounts: Amount of units for burning for every unit type

claimResources(address,uint256).details: Amount of points will be taken may be lesser if building does not have resources in its treasury

params.buildingAddress: Address of the building treasury of which will be robbed
params.points: Amount of points to spend for resources

demilitarize(string[],uint256[]).details: Even though demilitarization of 0 units may seem reasonable, it is disabled

params.unitNames: Names of the unit types for demilitarization
params.unitsCount: Amount of units for demilitarization for every unit type

epoch().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage and world

getCurrentPosition().details: This method should be used to determine real army position

getMovementPath().details: Useful to get entire movement path rather than querying each path item by index. It does not take into account if army is finished move by time

returns._0: Entire path army is taken during movement

getOwner().details: Same as owner of the settlement to which this army belongs

returns._0: Address of the owner of the army

getTotalSiegeSupport().details: For every unit type placed in siege calculates sum of all of them

returns.totalSiegeSupport: Total siege support of the army

init(address).details: Called by factory contract which creates current instance

isHomePosition().details: Takes into account if army movement is finished

joinBattle(address,uint256).details: Moving army is able to join battle only if caller is another army (drags it into battle)

params.side: Side of the battle army will join (sideA = 1, sideB = 2)

move(uint32[],uint256).details: Even though path can be provided artificial only allowed movement to a settlement

params.foodToSpendOnFeeding: Amount of food army will take from current position settlements FARM in order to decrease total time army will take to get to destination position
params.path: Path army will take to the settlement

newBattle(address,string[],uint256[]).details: Creates IBattle and sets both armies in created battle

params.armyAddress: Address of the army this army will attack

setBattle(address).details: Can only be called by world or world asset

setSiege(address).details: Can only be called by world or world asset

setUnitsInSiege(string[],uint256[],strin.details: Provides ability to atomically setup/re-setup siege

params.addUnitsCount: Amount of units to put in siege for every unit type
params.addUnitsNames: Names of the unit types to put in siege
params.removeUnitsCount: Amount of units to withdraw from siege for every unit type
params.removeUnitsNames: Names of the unit types to withdraw from siege

updateState().details: Called on every action which are based on army state and time

world().details: Value is dereferenced from proxy storage

battle.details: If army is not in battle returns address(0). It does not take into account if battle is finished but army is not left the battle

currentPosition.details: Updated when army updates position. It does not take into account if army is movingTo proper query current position use #getCurrentPosition

currentSettlement.details: Immutable, initialized on the army creation

destinationPosition.details: Updated when army starts moving. It does not take into account if army is finished move by timeTo proper calculate destination position you need to check if army finished movement by comparing current time and movementTiming.endTime

movementPath.details: Updated when army starts moving. It does not take into account if army is finished move by timeTo proper query entire movementPath use #getMovementPath

movementTiming.details: Updated when army starts moving. It does not take into account if army is finished move by time

siege.details: If army is not in siege returns address(0)

stunTiming.details: Updated when army finishes move or when army loses battle

ExitedFromBattle(address).notice: Emitted when #updateState is called (even though event can be emitted only on the next action related to the current army, de-facto army will exit battle when battle is finished)

JoinedBattle(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when army joins battle. At the battle creation both armies (attacker and attacked) will emit this event. Attacker army will be side A and at attacked army will be sideB

NewBattle(address,address).notice: Emitted when #newBattle is called. Army which attacks another army will emit this event.

UpdatedPosition(address,uint32).notice: Emitted when #updatePosition is called (even though event can be emitted only on the next action related to the current army, de-facto army will update position based on 'movementTiming.endTime'

battle().notice: Battle in which army is on

claimResources(address,uint256).notice: Swaps accumulated robbery tokens in siege for resource

currentPosition().notice: Position where army currently stands on

currentSettlement().notice: Settlement address to which this army belongs

demilitarize(string[],uint256[]).notice: Demilitarizes part of the army. Demilitarization provides prosperity to the settlement army is currently staying on

destinationPosition().notice: Position to which are is moving to

getCurrentPosition().notice: Calculates current position taking to the account #movementTimings

getMovementPath().notice: Path army is taken during movement

getTotalSiegeSupport().notice: Calculates total siege support of the army

isHomePosition().notice: Calculates is army on its home position

joinBattle(address,uint256).notice: Joins current army in battle to the provided side

lastDemilitarizationTime().notice: Time at which last demilitarization occured

move(uint32[],uint256).notice: Initiates army movement to the settlement

movementPath(uint256).notice: Path army is taken during movement

newBattle(address,string[],uint256[]).notice: Initiates battle with another army is both are not in battle

setUnitsInSiege(string[],uint256[],strin.notice: Sets and withdraw units to/from siege

siege().notice: Siege in which are army is on

updateState().notice: Updates army state to the current block
